definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: State-of-the-art fine dining and all-day dining restaurant overlook the skylobby and pool.
sentences.chinese: 藝術和美食餐廳一應而全，俯瞰着空中大堂和泳池。

sentences.english: We will meet at 12 at the lobby,is it Ok?
sentences.chinese: 我將於12點在大堂同你會面。你看如何？

sentences.english: Outside you can relax on a sun lounger beside the pool.
sentences.chinese: 迷人的大堂設有一個休息區和免費無線網絡連接。

sentences.english: The Expo occupied 5 halls with a total area of around 15000 sqm.
sentences.chinese: 展覽場地佔5個大堂共有面積15000平方米。

sentences.english: Why does the Assistant Manager need to check the pigeon whole?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼大堂副理需要覈實整個文件架？

sentences.english: If you need help, please contact with assistant manager directly.
sentences.chinese: 您如需幫助，請直接與大堂副理聯繫。

sentences.english: Ladies and gentlemen, good afternoon! I am Zhang Min from North City Savings Office.
sentences.chinese: 我叫張敏，來自城南儲蓄所，目前的崗位是大堂經理。

sentences.english: Assistant Manager must be on duty at least 20 minutes earlier.
sentences.chinese: 大堂副理必須至少提前20分鐘上班。

sentences.english: Why does the Asst. Manager need to conduct the briefing?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼大堂副理須做每日簡報？

sentences.english: Assistant Managers are required to acknowledge all hotel incidents, which took place during the previous shift.
sentences.chinese: 大堂副理要知道在上個班酒店發生的所有事件。

sentences.english: I'm sorry . I can speak only a little English . I will get you the Assistant Manager.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我只懂簡單的英語，我去找大堂副理來幫忙。

sentences.english: Map and photos of the new bus stop have been posted on notice board of each block for reference.
sentences.chinese: 地圖及相關相片已張貼於各座大堂通告板，以作參考。

sentences.english: Perestroyka Hall is the largest cave in the Crimea.
sentences.chinese: 改革大堂是克里米亞最大的洞穴。

sentences.english: Reports directly to the Assistant Manager.
sentences.chinese: 直接向大堂經理彙報工作。

sentences.english: Why does the Assistant Manager have to be on duty at least 20 minutes earlier?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼大堂副理要至少提前20分鐘上班？

sentences.english: Located at the Front Desk, It offers you services for baggage.
sentences.chinese: 位於大堂總服務檯，爲您提供行李寄存服務。

definition: box (in a theater or concert hall)/private room (in a restaurant or karaoke)
private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
reception pavilion (generally part of a large residence, and often built in a garden)
